title: Blockchain Sleuths Link BALD Liquidity Rug Pull to Sam Bankman-Fried
description: The disgraced FTX founder is fingered by some who believe he removed liquidity from the BALD meme coin—before putting some back.

title: Digital Currency Group nearing settlement with Genesis creditors; reports $216M Q2 revenue as new CFO takes helm
description:
Digital Currency Group (DCG) is close to settling with the creditors of its subsidiary, Genesis, Bloomberg said on July 31. DCG reportedly released its second-quarter shareholder letter on the same day as Bloomberg’s article. In that letter, DCG wrote: “After months of tireless negotiations led by DCG leadership, we are close to reaching an agreement […]

The post Digital Currency Group nearing settlement with Genesis creditors; reports $216M Q2 revenue as new CFO takes helm appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Terraform Labs and Do Kwon to face SEC’s fraud allegations: US judge denies dismissal motion
description: In the most recent developments in the ongoing case between Terraform Labs and the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), a U.S. federal judge decided on Monday that the crypto firm and its founder, Do Kwon, will continue to face fraud allegations. Terraform Labs and Do Kwon, creators of two cryptocurrencies that had significant ... Read more
